hey i was just looking over the rules and i just wanted to know, does the 30 BP have to be used to create ships? or can it be used to buy more buildings. Also is it one mine and colony per planet? or just one of each to begin with

hey i was just looking over the rules and i just wanted to know, does the 30 BP have to be used to create ships? or can it be used to buy more buildings. Also is it one mine and colony per planet? or just one of each to begin with

One colony and mine per planet and yes the 30BP must be spent on ships.

Guys, we need to get some sort of video out this Saturday! Some sort of update video so this coming Saturday we are meeting and we are recording a short update video where we are going to explain what all we are planning and going to do! Please try and be there, but note we will record without you since it is mainly a update video. I also want to point out now that after we finish this test game, I want to make it so we all can record on our own time, so we can keep up with everything and I want to always keep a 2 week buffer on videos period! That means uploaded and ready to be released on that date. Like made public, so we can get release times standardized and we can deal with unexpected events.

I want all of this to happen because:

a) We haven't release a video in awhile.

I don't want us to be to pressured about recording times.

c) I want to make sure we can standardize release times to make it easier for people to watch.

Guys, we need to get some sort of video out this Saturday! Some sort of update video so this coming Saturday we are meeting and we are recording a short update video where we are going to explain what all we are planning and going to do! Please try and be there, but note we will record without you since it is mainly a update video. I also want to point out now that after we finish this test game, I want to make it so we all can record on our own time, so we can keep up with everything and I want to always keep a 2 week buffer on videos period! That means uploaded and ready to be released on that date. Like made public, so we can get release times standardized and we can deal with unexpected events.

I want all of this to happen because:

a) We haven't release a video in awhile.

I don't want us to be to pressured about recording times.

c) I want to make sure we can standardize release times to make it easier for people to watch.

Sounds good, i am on for Saturday(unless something comes up). Buffer time i think is a great idea, this gives us a lot of time to edit which we sorely are in need of. We should keep the update video quite brief i think and then move on to something more substantial, like mock battles and different possible scenarios to test the game mechanics we have created. Just out of curiosity, how long do you guys think or episode length should be? I was thinking 15-20 minutes, maybe with some 45 minute specials(season finale/first episode)

Sounds good, i am on for Saturday(unless something comes up). Buffer time i think is a great idea, this gives us a lot of time to edit which we sorely are in need of. We should keep the update video quite brief i think and then move on to something more substantial, like mock battles and different possible scenarios to test the game mechanics we have created. Just out of curiosity, how long do you guys think or episode length should be? I was thinking 15-20 minutes, maybe with some 45 minute specials(season finale/first episode)

A good 15-20 mins is good for an episode I feel. I love the idea of season openers and finales (or even big events) getting larger episodes.

Im good for this Saturday. While I do have finals, I'll be studying for those Friday and Sunday and this'll be a much needed break

Also, if we could make the ship submissions a bigger deal on the main page we'll get more than trolls on the submission page
